function.name: GetRCColor
function.description: Gets a color from the configuration database.

parameter.name: pszKeyName
parameter.description: Name of the key to retrieve.

parameter.name: crDefault
parameter.description: Default value to return if the key cannot be found in the configuration database.

return.description: If the key is found, the return value is the value from the configuration database. If the key cannot be found, the return value is the value of the crDefault parameter.
